00137 class MainWindow: public QMainWindow, private Ui::MainWindow

00139         Q_OBJECT
00140 
00145         class QStringFromBoostVariant: public boost::static_visitor<QString>
00146         {
00147                 const MainWindow * mParent;
00148         public:
00149                 QStringFromBoostVariant(const MainWindow * p): mParent(p) {}
00150                 QString operator()(const int& i) const          { return QString::number(i); }
00151                 QString operator()(const std::string& s) const  { return QString(tr(s.c_str())); }
00152                 QString operator()(const double& d) const       { return mParent->qstringFromDouble(d); }
00153                 QString operator()(const complex& c) const { return mParent->qstringFromComplex(c); }
00154         };

00354 class LangAction: public QAction
00355 {
00356         Q_OBJECT
00357 public:
00363         LangAction(QObject * parent, const QString& fn):
00364                 QAction(parent), langFilename(fn)
00365         {
00366                 setText(tr(fn.toAscii().data()));
00367                 connect(this, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(triggeredSlot()));
00368         }
00369 public slots:
00372         void triggeredSlot() { emit triggered(langFilename); }
00373 signals:
00376         void triggered(const QString&);
00377 private:
00378         const QString   langFilename; 
00379 };
